meanings.definition: Second person singular form of the verb 'to be'.
meanings.sent2: Yesterday, you bist at the park.
meanings.sent3: When you bist sleepy, you yawn a lot.
meanings.sent4: In the play, the actor bist a brave knight.
meanings.sent5: If you bist kind, others will appreciate you.

meanings.definition: Past tense of the verb 'to be'.
meanings.sent2: Last week, they bist at the concert.
meanings.sent3: The cat bist very curious about the new toy.
meanings.sent4: The old house bist once a grand mansion.
meanings.sent5: The stars bist bright in the night sky.
